title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Using Educational Institutional Archives to Unsettle and Rectify Racial Pasts
itunes:title: Sociology of Race and Ethnicity - Using Educational Institutional Archives to Unsettle and Rectify Racial Pasts
description: Author Devon Goss discusses her article, "Using Educational Institutional Archives to Unsettle and Rectify Racial Pasts," published in the October 2021 issue of Sociology of Race and Ethnicity.
